    "size": 26764,
    "content": "# 1.0.0 - Comprehensive Person Structure Definition

## Purpose

This document defines EVERY type of data a person might want to store in their Hypernet account. This is the complete specification for the 1.* node structure.

**Hypernet Address:** `1.0.0`
**Applies To:** All living people (1.1+)
**Last Updated:** February 10, 2026

---

## Philosophy: Your Complete Digital Life

Hypernet is designed to store **everything** about a person's digital and physical life:
- Every email, photo, video, document
- Every password, credential, secret
- Every financial transaction, account, investment
- Every medical record, prescription, appointment
- Every relationship, connection, interaction
- Every task, goal, achievement
- Every thought, note, idea
- Every purchase, subscription, asset
- Everything you might need, reference, or cherish

**Privacy First:** You control what's stored, who sees it, and how it's used.

---

## Complete Structure: 1.X.Y.Z

### Level 1: Major Categories (1.X)

```
1.X.0 - Profile & Identity
1.X.1 - Projects & Work
1.X.2 - Documents & Files
1.X.3 - Communications
1.X.4 - Relationships & Social
1.X.5 - Tasks & Productivity
1.X.6 - Personal Data (Hypernet Objects)
1.X.7 - Contributions & Output
1.X.8 - Media & Creative
1.X.9 - Notes & Knowledge
```

---

## 1.X.0 - Profile & Identity

### Purpose
Your core identity, biographical information, and public presence.

### Structure

**1.X.0.0 - Basic Profile**
- Full name (legal, preferred, nicknames)
- Date of birth, place of birth
- Gender identity, pronouns
- Current location, home address
- Contact information (phone, email, etc.)
- Emergency contacts
- Languages spoken
- Citizenship, passport information
- Profile photos

**1.X.0.1 - Biography & Life Story**
- Personal narrative
- Major life events timeline
- Achievements and milestones
- Life philosophy and values
- Goals and aspirations
- Legacy wishes

**1.X.0.2 - Professional Identity**
- Current role and employer
- Job title, responsibilities
- Career history (timeline)
- Resumes/CVs (multiple versions)
- Professional bio
- LinkedIn profile export
- References and recommendations

**1.X.0.3 - Education**
- Schools attended (timeline)
- Degrees and certifications
- Transcripts
- Diplomas and certificates (scans)
- Student IDs
- Academic achievements
- Coursework and projects

**1.X.0.4 - Skills & Expertise**
- Technical skills (with proficiency levels)
- Soft skills
- Languages (fluency levels)
- Certifications and licenses
- Training courses completed
- Skill endorsements

**1.X.0.5 - Public Presence**
- Website/blog
- Social media profiles
- Public speaking engagements
- Publications and articles
- Interviews and media appearances
- Online reputation

**1.X.0.6 - Government IDs & Documents**
- Driver's license (scan)
- Passport (scan, never full image for security)
- Social Security card (secured)
- Birth certificate
- Marriage certificate
- Divorce decree
- Military service records
- Voter registration

**1.X.0.7 - Physical Characteristics**
- Height, weight
- Eye color, hair color
- Blood type
- Identifying marks (tattoos, scars)
- Allergies
- Medical conditions (summary)

---

## 1.X.1 - Projects & Work

### Purpose
All projects, work output, and professional activities.

### Structure

**1.X.1.0 - Active Projects**
- Current work projects
- Side projects and hobbies
- Startups and ventures
- Volunteer projects
- Creative projects

Each project includes:
- Project name, description
- Start date, target completion
- Goals and milestones
- Team members and collaborators
- Files and resources
- Progress tracking
- Related tasks

**1.X.1.1 - Completed Projects**
- Successfully finished projects
- Outcomes and results
- Lessons learned
- Portfolio pieces
- Case studies

**1.X.1.2 - Archived Projects**
- Paused or abandoned projects
- Historical projects
- Reference projects

**1.X.1.3 - Work History**
- Detailed employment history
- Job descriptions and responsibilities
- Performance reviews
- Promotions and raises
- Awards and recognition
- Work samples and deliverables

**1.X.1.4 - Business Ventures**
- Companies founded or co-founded
- Business plans
- Pitch decks
- Investment documents
- Partnership agreements
- Exit documents (if applicable)

**1.X.1.5 - Intellectual Property**
- Patents filed or granted
- Trademarks
- Copyrights
- Trade secrets
- Inventions and innovations

---

## 1.X.2 - Documents & Files

### Purpose
All personal, business, and legal documents.

### Structure

**1.X.2.0 - Personal Documents**
- Personal statements
- Autobiographical writing
- Journals and diaries
- Personal letters (written/received)
- Family tree and genealogy
- Photo albums (non-digital)
- Scrapbooks

**1.X.2.1 - Business Documents**
- Contracts and agreements
- NDAs and confidentiality agreements
- Business correspondence
- Meeting minutes
- Reports and presentations
- Proposals and quotes
- Invoices and receipts

**1.X.2.2 - Legal Documents**
- Will and testament
- Trust documents
- Power of attorney
- Living will / advance directive
- Legal contracts
- Court documents
- Settlement agreements
- Legal correspondence

**1.X.2.3 - Financial Documents**
- Tax returns (by year)
- W-2s, 1099s, K-1s
- Brokerage statements
- Bank statements
- Credit card statements
- Loan documents
- Mortgage documents
- Investment prospectuses
- Financial planning documents

**1.X.2.4 - Insurance Documents**
- Health insurance policies
- Life insurance policies
- Auto insurance
- Home/renters insurance
- Disability insurance
- Umbrella policies
- Insurance claims
- Policy declarations

**1.X.2.5 - Property & Real Estate**
- Deeds and titles
- Lease agreements
- Rental agreements
- Property inspection reports
- Appraisals
- Closing documents
- HOA documents
- Property tax records

**1.X.2.6 - Vehicle Documents**
- Vehicle titles
- Registration documents
- Insurance cards
- Maintenance records
- Purchase/sale documents
- Loan/lease agreements

**1.X.2.7 - Medical Documents**
- Medical history summary
- Immunization records
- Surgical records
- Lab results
- Imaging results (X-rays, MRIs, etc.)
- Doctor's notes
- Hospital discharge papers
- Medical directives

**1.X.2.8 - Education Documents**
- Transcripts (all schools)
- Diplomas and certificates
- Test scores (SAT, GRE, etc.)
- Letters of recommendation
- Scholarship documents
- Student loan documents

**1.X.2.9 - Reference Materials**
- Manuals and guides
- Warranties
- Product documentation
- How-to guides
- Research materials
- Saved articles and papers

---

## 1.X.3 - Communications

### Purpose
All forms of communication and correspondence.

### Structure

**1.X.3.0 - Email**
- Email accounts (multiple)
- Inbox, sent, archived
- Email threads and conversations
- Important emails (flagged)
- Email attachments
- Distribution lists
- Email rules and filters

Supported formats:
- Gmail, Outlook, Yahoo, etc.
- IMAP/POP3 archives
- .mbox, .pst, .eml formats

**1.X.3.1 - Messages & Chat**
- SMS/text messages
- WhatsApp messages
- Signal messages
- Telegram messages
- Messenger (Facebook)
- iMessage archives
- Slack conversations
- Discord chats
- Teams messages

**1.X.3.2 - Voice & Video Calls**
- Call logs (phone, VoIP)
- Voicemail recordings
- Video call recordings (Zoom, etc.)
- Conference call notes

**1.X.3.3 - Social Media Messages**
- Twitter/X DMs
- Instagram DMs
- LinkedIn messages
- Facebook messages
- Reddit messages
- TikTok messages

**1.X.3.4 - Letters & Correspondence**
- Physical letters (scanned)
- Postcards (scanned)
- Greeting cards
- Thank you notes
- Formal correspondence

**1.X.3.5 - Meeting Notes**
- One-on-one meetings
- Team meetings
- Board meetings
- Conference calls
- Webinars attended
- Action items and follow-ups

**1.X.3.6 - Professional Communication**
- Business emails
- Client correspondence
- Vendor communication
- Partner discussions
- Networking conversations

---

## 1.X.4 - Relationships & Social

### Purpose
All relationships, connections, and social interactions.

### Structure

**1.X.4.0 - Family**
- Immediate family members
- Extended family
- Family tree
- Family events and gatherings
- Family photos and memories
- Shared family documents

**1.X.4.1 - Friends**
- Close friends
- Acquaintances
- Childhood friends
- College friends
- Work friends
- Friend groups
- Friendship history

**1.X.4.2 - Professional Network**
- Colleagues (current and past)
- Mentors and mentees
- Business partners
- Clients and customers
- Vendors and suppliers
- Industry contacts
- Professional associations

**1.X.4.3 - Romantic Relationships**
- Current partner/spouse
- Dating history
- Relationship timeline
- Anniversaries and milestones
- Relationship documents (marriage cert, etc.)

**1.X.4.4 - Social Connections**
- Social media connections
- Online communities
- Forum memberships
- Group memberships
- Club affiliations

**1.X.4.5 - Contacts Database**
- Name, email, phone
- Address (home, work)
- Birthday, anniversary
- Notes and tags
- Relationship type
- Last contact date
- Communication preferences
- Social media profiles

**1.X.4.6 - Events & Gatherings**
- Parties attended/hosted
- Weddings
- Funerals and memorials
- Reunions
- Conferences and networking events
- Social gatherings

---
